# Terra Cotta Lion (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]], [[5th Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 5]] (earth)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (a terra cotta statue of a foo lion, up to 1 foot tall and costing 10 gp)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One statuette touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Complete Arcane (WotC)Â­, pg. 126

 As *[[Terra Cotta Warrior (Spell)|terra cotta warrior]]*, but the spell animates a statuette of a foo lion (a celestial dire lion) into a Huge animated object (Huge construct, 90 hp, AC 13, hardness 6, speed 30 ft., attack slam +9, damage 2d6+7). As with *[[Terra Cotta Warrior (Spell)|terra cotta warrior]]*, the lion has none of the animated object attack forms.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Cleric 5, Sorcerer 5, Wizard 5 to Level.
